text:
Central Drug Authority of India, DCGA gives approval for the emergency use of the Russian vaccine, #SputnikV. This vaccine will be the third #COVID19 vaccine, along with #Covishield and #Covaxin, to get clearance in India.

#LargestVaccineDrive #IndiaFightsCorona
#Vaccine https://t.co/lWpSlP7h6H
